definition.equivalent: bam, blow, chop, clobber, clout, crash, crunch, hit, impact, kick, knock, pelt, pound, punch, slam, slug, smash, strike, thud, thunk, wham
definition.meaning: the sound of an impact during a fight

definition.equivalent: catch, clutch, glom, grab, grasp, hold, nab, seize, snag, snatch
definition.meaning: seizing something with a sudden motion or grasp
